_header: Of Mary mild now will I mean
Note: For the earlier text of which this is a free redaction, see 2165.
_description: The Assumption of the Virgin Mary in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Of mari milde now will I meneþat of all heuyns es corond quene…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …so þat we may bide albideneWhare he es king and sche es quene
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 112-18.
